name: Spook House (Basilio0505)
description:
As part of a final project for Game History and Theory my team and I created a 2D video game based on classic 3rd generation game systems such as the NES.

In this game you play as a security guard at a laboratory where the experiments have escaped and now roam free, you have to find the key to the exit to make your escape by navigating the darkness with only your flashlight to reveal the key while also avoiding the creatures that lurk.

All art and sounds are original.

Controls:

Use arrow keys to navigate

Team Members:

Basilio Bazan - Design / Programming

Harrison Ward - Programming / Art / Sound

Daniel Andrade - Programming

Bryan Guzman - Art

Elmer Fernandez - Art
